problem_text_cn: 如图,AB=AC,AF∥BC,∠FAC=75°,E为BC延长线上一点,∠ABC与∠ACE的平分线相交于点D,则∠D的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB = AC, AF ∥ BC, ∠FAC = N_0, E is a point on the BC extended line, and the bisector of ∠ABC and ∠ACE intersects at point D, then the degree of ∠D is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了等腰三角形的性质,关键是根据三角形内角和定理和平行线的性质解答
